name: double-take
description: Double Take is a face detection and recognition hub that integrates multiple detection engines with home automation systems. It lets you review captures, confirm faces, and route events to platforms like Home Assistant.
features: Face Detection: Advanced facial recognition using multiple detection engines for accurate identification.
Home Automation: Seamless integration with Home Assistant and other smart home platforms for automated responses.
Multiple Engines: Support for various detection backends including Frigate, DeepStack, and CompreFace.
Review Interface: Web-based interface to review, confirm, or reject face detection results with training capabilities.
Real-time Processing: Process camera feeds in real-time with configurable detection sensitivity and thresholds.
Event Routing: Route detection events to external systems with customizable webhooks and API calls.
Training System: Improve accuracy by training the system with confirmed positive and negative detections.
Camera Integration: Connect with multiple IP cameras and video sources for comprehensive monitoring coverage.
Notification System: Send alerts via email, push notifications, or webhooks when specific faces are detected.
Privacy Controls: Local processing ensures facial data remains on your own infrastructure without cloud dependencies.
Statistics Dashboard: View detection statistics, accuracy metrics, and system performance with detailed analytics.
Backup Management: Export and import training data and configurations for system backup and migration.
